commands.add: adds item to the list of consumed foods, adds new item to the database if needed
commands.remove: removes item from the list of today's consumed foods
commands.reset: resets values for the day, i.e. current values, foods eaten today, etc.
commands.items: displays all items consumed for the day
commands.left: shows how much of different nutrition is still left to be consumed to meet daily goal
commands.commands: displays a list of available commands and their description
